. Since it is a fairly small city, you can walk and also bike around.
Nice Neighborhood Parks, Homes and Small city center.
There are a recreational pavilion, lots of parks, and convenience stores.

There is a 2 supermarkets in Mountlake Terrace. In western Mountlake Terrace, there is a Rogers that is across the street from a plaza that contains a Post Office, a Butcher, and a pizza shoppe.

The other Supermarket is across the street from papa Johns and is on 44th Ave. West. It is in a plaza that contains a local restaurants, a local pub, a Bartell Drugs, a laundromat, and a 24 hour Fitness across the street from a bank.

Up the street in NE Mountlake Terrace is an Arco Station that is across the street from a tattoo parlor, a small convenience store, and teriyaki Joint.

Local burger joint, Red Onion. Owned by a couple who make AWESOME burgers and fries.

There is also a Papa Johns in eastern Mountlake Terrace who does Delivery.

There is a coffee stand Across the street from the Red Onion who make good coffee.

Next door to Papa Johns there is a Starbucks.
